author: Andrew Phang Boon Leong JA (delivering the judgment of the court):
casename: Sandar Aung v Parkway Hospitals Singapore Pte Ltd (trading as Mount Elizabeth Hospital) and Another
coram: Andrew Ang J; Chan Sek Keong CJ; Andrew Phang Boon Leong JA
counsel: Ponniah James Leslie and Leong Sue Lynn (Wong & Lim) for the appellant; Lek Siang Pheng and Mar Seow Hwei (Rodyk & Davidson) for the respondents
tags-parsed: Contract/Contractual terms/Rules of construction/Contract with hospital to pay all expenses incurred by stay in hospital and estimate of bill furnished by hospital signed/Final bill exceeding estimate greatly/Whether contract including estimate of bill such that no liability for payment of excess costs existing/Whether context and factual background of agreement relevant
